DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric ratio computed to represent the ratio of the abdominal circumference at the navel to maximum hip and buttocks circumference; looks at the proportion of fat stored on your body around your waist and hip; carrying extra weight around the stomach is riskier for your health than carrying extra weight around the hips or thighs.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Numeric value computed to represent the ratio of the abdominal circumference at the navel to maximum hip and buttocks circumference; looks at the proportion of fat stored on your body around your waist and hip. [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: ratio of the abdominal circumference at the navel to maximum hip and buttocks circumference; looks at the proportion of fat stored on your body around your waist and hip; carrying extra weight around the stomach is riskier for your health than carrying extra weight around the hips or thighs.

Concepts.definition: The ratio of the abdominal circumference at the navel to maximum hip and buttocks circumference; looks at the proportion of fat stored on the body around the waist and hip. Carrying extra weight around the waist is a greater health risk than carrying extra weight around the hips or thighs.

Property.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/10/12 FBPP content retired per Jenny Larkin (NHLBI); reused by other released CDEs.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the ratio regarding an assessment result.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The ratio of two or more signals, typically between two channels.  Of type float. (caMAGE):A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Quotient of quantities of the same kind for different components within the same system.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
